message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,100,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe the value of this product is significantly higher. I could come down to $1,050,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above that number. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,025,000 for the product.
